website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not quite enough to draw committed iPhone or Android owners, the BlackBerry Z10's modern design and features give BlackBerry fans what they've hungered for.
pros: RIM dug deep to give the slick-looking BlackBerry Z10 enough features to satisfy both consumers and professionals -- like a good camera and a sharp user interface
cons: The Z10's unintuitive gesture paradigm creates a learning curve, and a long list of OS inefficiencies and omissions sour the experience
The bare-bones maps app and a deficit of camera features are two examples

customer_reviews.title: No Android apps allowed
customer_reviews.text: The main thing wrong with this blackberry is that not all apps can be used . Additionally the battery dies fast like after 2 hours and faster if you're playing a game. you
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Only for BlackBerry fans
customer_reviews.text: Blackberry phones are not friendly like androids / Iphones....have to use it because of company's requirements. Battery like sucks and it seems to turn on alone as my battery is always dead. Thanks god is being replaced by iphone in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good OS. Nice design/style
customer_reviews.text: Very good OS. Nice design/style. BlackBerry no longer supports the OS. Is instead using their hardware and loading Android OS...too bad. Use to be a great product...they missed the curve on the APPS. CAMERA NEVER WORKED! Tactile texting was the BEST on the market...ultimately gave it too my pre-teen & tuned off data plan. She loved the ease of texting but hated that camera didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: lex12

customer_reviews.title: Really good device
customer_reviews.text: It is a good device with many features. It is a solid phone and keeps everything organized in one place, the Hub. All your email, text messages, calls, and social media are all in the Hub and well organized.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I know this is an old blackberry, but it is definitely still worth the buy if you want an inexpensive phone on BB10. It may not have all the apps that you would get on an android or iphone, but it is dependable for it's price tag and CAN get very good apps if you take the time to youtube a few tutorials. Blackberry will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had!!!
customer_reviews.text: There was absolutely NOTHING ever wrong with the phone. No issues, no problems, nothing negative. I wanted an upgrade but US phone companies stopped carrying them, or I'd still owe one.
customer_reviews.author: LiIsabella D.

customer_reviews.title: it's excellent product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. Shop fulfilled with the delivery and arrived on time. the texture and material of the product is of high quality. I am satisfied with the product. I recommend the seller and the products they sell. The product price is commensurate with the quality. The relationship between price and quality is good. The expectations of the product is guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: Alvarosva

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Add Or Save Contacts
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this phone and I loved until I could not save any contacts on the phone. Since T-Mobile is my carrier they helped as much as they could and then transferred me to Blackberry. I was on the phone with a Blackberry Tech for an hour trying to get this phone to add contacts. In the end I was talked through creating a report to send to the tech. Per the tech, it may take 24 to 48 hours to see if this issue can be resolved. At least I'm exhausting all of my avenues. If the issue cannot be resolved, I will be sending back my Blackberry Z10.
customer_reviews.author: Original Hersheybar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone from SurgeTelecom in August, it arrived extremely promptly (one or two days after placing the order) in factory condition. It was as described (unlocked) and works perfectly in the UK with a UK SIM card. My favourite feature has to be BlackBerry Hub, where all your messages and notifications are grouped together in one easily accessible area. I cannot recommend this phone enough.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy...very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. The phone itself (OS, design and layout, speed, memory and other features) is great. Great storage space and the option to expand. Cons: When I first received it I was disappointed to see that it had verizon's logo all over it (advertiser didn't specify that). It was unlocked as specified but I couldn't use data services due to locked (verizon) APN settings. However, this was resolved with an OS upgrade. Finally, if I'm running an app (especially a high graphic game) the surface of the phone gets hot to the touch and making a call can be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is easily one of the best phones I've ever had. I absolutely love the unique interface and although Blackberry 10 is new, there are many things about this phone that remind you of the Blackberry style that you're used to. Easily competes with many of the other phones in its class as well .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harris

customer_reviews.title: my credit for a product I did not like and did not keep.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this blackberry cellphone with the return ticket, but I never received credit back to my credit card. The phone itself was more and more complicated than my blackberry curve. So I was not happen with the product, requested a return and sent it back but I never received credit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone; great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Great UI; love the Hub integration. I bought this phone to replace my current one. I am really impressed with the ease of use and many other features it has. Swipe gestures are easy to learn and very practical. Outlook integration through BlackBerry Link is flawless to keep my contacts and calendar up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR T-MOBILE CUSTOMERS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE A T-MOBILE CUSTOMER. Ad states it is compatible with GSM carriers such as T-Mobile. Yes, it is but it will not connect to their 4G towers so therefore the internet is useless. This is misleading because it's a 4G phone stating it is compatible with T-Mobile. (Not just people buying the phone carelessly). Also you will need to update the operating system before transferring anything over because if you reboot, the phone loses everything.
customer_reviews.author: MELINDA

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement- Was not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Z10 because I previously owned one and loved it. I live in the Bahamas and therefore needed an unlocked one. I ordered this one and it did not come unlocked. I have wasted time and money purchasing unlock codes online. No site could find the unlock code for the IMEI # of this phone. I now have to resort to returning it and purchasing a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Christabelle

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY !!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM A BBRY USER SINCE 1998 AND REFRAINED FROM CHANGING TO IPHONE OR SAMSUNG "WAITING TIRELESSLY " FOR BBRY TO KEEP IT UP. BOUGHT THE Z10 A MONTH AGO TO REPLACE MY BOLD 9900 AND I AM SO GLAD I WAITED. THIS NEW PHONE IS AMAZING. I COMPARE IT WITH THE IP AND SS THAT MY CHILDREN HAVE AND REALLY FEEL RELIEVED I WAITED . IT PAID OFF THE WAITING VERY PLEASANTLY. GREAT JOB BBRY!!!
customer_reviews.author: BABAU

customer_reviews.title: blackberry Z10
customer_reviews.text: I am a phone nerd. I have several, one from each major platform. The Z10 is a nice phone, it is perfect size and built with quality, compared to samsung products it feels premium in your hand. It does have certain limitations as a media player /entertainment center...android offers more and better stuff, but as a work phone it's really a nice phone....
customer_reviews.author: chuck d

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because by then I had not done my homework well, this phone is STL100-1 model and since i didn't do any inquiry it was sent to me. even though i was expecting STL100-3, this phones has beaten my expectation, at first i was not getting 4G on T-mobile, but now I get it. my problem now is sometimes it over heats and this drains the battery within 2hrs, but now i have a solution to that. since blackberry has become part of me i will recommend everybody to buy one even if not this, another model as I'm looking forward to buying any new BlackBerry phone that comes out.
customer_reviews.author: appiadans

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise most apps are either not available of have problems running in blackberries system. No Venmo, no instagram, no messenger and no whatsapp. I bought it because it has about 16GB internal memory that will last along time, because I'll never install any app on it. Put your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! It was shipped within a reasonable time ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! It was shipped within a reasonable time and arrived in two days in very good condition, as promised. This was a replacement for my Blackberry Z10 rendered inoperable from breakage. I was without a cell phone for a few days after deciding to re-order the Z10 rather than buy another brand to replace it. I love my Blackberry and didn't want to give up the great features you don't get in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charming Phone; In it's Own Way
customer_reviews.text: This phone has potential, but still some ways from challenging my Samsung Galaxy S3. It has some features that are not apparent in the other devices, but they do get some getting use to. All in all not a bad device. I just wish Blackberry had produced this a bit earlier
customer_reviews.author: Cayon Man

customer_reviews.title: Just an awesome phone. Very excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome phone. Very excellent price, completely new, mint, no problems of any kind. Very happy. This is my 5th one. I'm just clumsy with any cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Burboa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with purchase and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Purchased used device, listed "like New" but was not even close. Device had noticeable wear - back cover did not close properly. Also slight chip on front display somewhat obscured by volume controls but noticeable to touch. Claimed to have original packaging which was questionable. Seems like it was a clever facsimile when compared to original box I received from my employer.for the same device. Amazaon had supposedly inspected this phone. I find that hard to believe and bottom line was very disappointed with purchase/experience.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone because I lost my all one and I was so glad that I bought it again
customer_reviews.text: Completely absurd¡¡. Be careful before you buy it. I bought this phone because I lost my all one and I was so glad that I bought it again. To my surprise this phone now doesn't support whatsapp. Can you believe it?. This is the first time I experience discrimination from technology. Watsapp should at least work as an old version but not even that. I'm completely left out.
customer_reviews.author: jorge Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: very good phone in competitive price
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the latest update OS of this phone, as it can directly install most of the android apps. Only few things dont work properly which is of android. One drawback is that it take too much time in booting :( but I think most of blackberry product has same issue. But it is stable. First I was thinking of having android phone, but fortunately I have made a good decision by choosing Z10. Another big issue is its battery, it dies in a day with wifi always ON, BB should have improved it little better because while doing video chat you will find the issue of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Rajiv Kr Chouhan

customer_reviews.title: Scam.  Useless.
customer_reviews.text: This phone was listed as new but is clearly refurbished. It has a "special" feature.... If the battery runs out, or if you shut the phone off completely, EVERYTHING is gone... as if it was a new phone. Completely deletes every bit of memory it has. VERY frustrating. Basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Ward

customer_reviews.title: This Phone is my Mobile Secretary and office Assistant in one
customer_reviews.text: I have migrated from the Torch 9810 touch & keyboard, to the Z10 fully touch Screen, Love the touch it seem omnidirectional, and the swiping motion "so simple". The 2 minute voice note was a pleasant suprise and is well loved! I am a businessman and I need to do voice messages longer that a minute on most accasions. Then the 2 cameras very well tought of. to be continued.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Mc Rae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried cause of the negative reviews but once I got it in my hands and started using it, everything was perfect. It's new STL100-3 (Supports 4G) Nothing wrong with the battery Charges perfectly fine. I'm over the moon right now.. definitely buying it again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving my new Z10
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm loving my Z10. Previously I used a curve 9300 so I'm really enjoying the new features of the Z10. Perhaps the other phone platforms have features not yet available on BBOS 10 but I think this phone is a great step in the right direction. I love the BlackBerry Link software which allows you to link your phone and pc remotely. It feels good and looks good. Easy to set up and the tutorial at the start was very helpful. It allowed me to dive right into the new interface.
customer_reviews.author: DARREN C.

customer_reviews.title: works great for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th BlackBerry and the best so far. I'm gonna continue using BlackBerry cellphones. I see major improvement with the technology. Keeps me connected to what's important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Whitewater Ministries

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone!
customer_reviews.text: Good equipment to Venezuela, pass me the difference that I could only use 900 Mhz band Digitel since the Z10 that is the STL100 pedi-2 model and that is recommended for my country Venezuela. Please check carefully before buying equipment.

customer_reviews.title: great if you could add I would do ten star, really really good stuff ..

customer_reviews.title: Still a contender in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: As an Apple fan boy I have to say that the BB Z10 does give the iPhone a run for it's money. It is too bad that the latest OS was not available before a lot of people stopped really buying Blackberries. Also the ability to load Android apps is a big plus due to the lack of apps in the BB world catalog.

customer_reviews.title: Can't even use it
customer_reviews.text: Won't even unlike because it has anti theft on and I can't use it👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾

customer_reviews.title: This is not LTE compatible because it's the STL-001 model ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not LTE compatible because it's the STL-001 model. By buying this phone you are playing Russian roulette because you may not receive the right model. Research on Google to find comparisons on the different models and compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE PHONE WAS NOT UNLOCKED AS CLAIMED
customer_reviews.text: You assured this phone is unlocked, and I raised a concern about it. Only for me to get to my country and find out it won't work without a verizon sim. What sort of vendor are you? Do you know how much it costs to unlock a phone in nigeria? This is really terrible. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Babajide O.

customer_reviews.title: Grate quality.
customer_reviews.text: After almost 6 years I am writing this review to say that was one of the best mobiles that I had purchase. Congrats!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but get the Z30 instead
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little phone, but after using it extensively and then later using the, I would have to recommend going with the Z30 all the way. This phone is very similar, but the display is smaller. The best thing about it (and the Z30) is the fantastic text prediction on the touchscreen keyboard. It learns from your writing style and predicts beautifully what your next word is going to be. The text prediction is far, far better than anything I have seen on an Android device. I am very sorry to see Blackberry go. The Z30 may be one of my favorite phones ever, and this one is right behind it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Does not Work With Freedom Pop Mobile Plan
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is a good phone, but Blackberry is a pain to run Android apps, and I wanted to use Freedom Pop app with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Mihrigul

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone. It is really unlocked and has great ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone. It is really unlocked and has great features. I have been using it for longer than a year now and haven't had any problems. I would definitely recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: Vijata D.

customer_reviews.title: This phone is amazing! It is literally a joy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The Z10 feels great in the hand. the swiping gestures take a few minutes to get accustomed to, but once you figure it out, it becomes so natural. The keyboard is hands down, the BEST virtual keyboard on any touchscreen phone. The more you use it, the better it gets. I don't even bother typing with 2 hands because 1 handed typing it so efficient and fun with flicking words. The word prediction works great too. Highly Recommended. Get your Z10 now!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Z10 Unlocked - Was a Verizon device....
customer_reviews.text: Received Product sooner than expected. Received wrong product. Purchased: Unlocked BlackBerry Z10 - Description says it would not work on Verizon, which is perfect... I use AT&T. Received Verizon device. No exchange available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, light weight and slim
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, light weight and slim. Better to carry than those huge phones my friends carry. Battery didn't hold a charge very long but bought a back up battery and it holds a charge much longer. Lots of apps available.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: The service provided is very good but the product I got from Mango Wirelles came with manufacturing defect. "The product arrived defective, When you turn it off after a few seconds and then turns and reboots Constantly. I want to replace the factory default." I want to receive recommendations for refund. Thank you. Sorry the above comment was related to this product. thanks
customer_reviews.author: frank lobaton

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the sellers misrepresentation of the product
customer_reviews.text: This phone was advertised as a factory unlocked phone. Its Unlocked, but its a Verizon phone. It cannot operate on LIme or Digicel Networks in the caribbean. It only runs on Edge which is very slow. Very disappointed with the sellers misrepresentation of the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Z10
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with z10, easy to setup with tMobile, pics are very good . Recommend to anyone who is using for business. Cannot argue on the price. Seller is prompt and phone received is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: niket saraf

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Device was fully unlocked and instantly worked with my carrier. Device is great a real step up to the plate device from Blackberry. Loving all the features. Delivered on time and in excellent condition by seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil W.

customer_reviews.title: the best purchase in a cellphone
customer_reviews.text: The phone was delivered on time (for us.snail mail I had to meet the mail man at one of his stops. ) the phone is in excellent condition. The blackberry Z10 is the fastest and most versatile cell phone I've ever owned. Including the I phones .
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Super phone! For any die-hard BlackBerry users that are ...
customer_reviews.text: Super phone! For any die-hard BlackBerry users that are considering the iPhone or Samsung, try this one first. Extremely easy to use, especially for business use. Can't beat the price or quality; I have not had a bit of problem with this phone. Battery lasts 18 hours with heavy use, before it needs a recharge.
customer_reviews.author: R. E.  Packer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplte product
customer_reviews.text: I have received the charger from Europe, but not the America and now I have to buy an adapter to charge my phone, also the protector came in a box Galaxy SIII instead of BlackBerry, have not tried it but the box clearly says Samsung SIII
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Verizon locked and not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed with the purchase of this phone sold by Arab system. They say it is unlocked but that is not true at all. It is locked via Verizon, i shipped it out of the continent but now i cant use it. Please be very careful people

customer_reviews.title: stopped working in just 5 months...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone on june 22nd and it stopped working suddenly. I am trying to contact the seller but I am not finding the details. worst ever buy.

customer_reviews.title: Z10 is generally a great phone, but not the set I bought from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against Z10 I got another one from AT&T and it was great. But as the AT&T set was locked, I could not use it overseas. The unlocked set I bought from Amazon was used and had bad reception. Also the battery drained pretty fast. I had to return it.

customer_reviews.title: This item is OK, I like it
customer_reviews.text: The product is as expected This item is OK, I like it I recommend this product to everybody This product is good quality

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone...
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Blackberry user for many years, and I really like this phone. I have a small business, so the apps are perfect.. It's easy to use, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for over a year now and have no complaints. The keyboard is far superior to the iPhone and Android models and the phone is really easy to use. I would definitely recommend this to someone not looking to break the bank on a phone but still have a great user experience.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!! You must try it!
customer_reviews.text: This phone looks and feels good! The battery last a very long time and I can get trhough the day without any charging; I do a lot of calls. Its easy to use and I like the BB hub, its so convenient to have everything in one place. The camera is also really good! The touch screen keyboard is so accurate, I can type fast and hardly miss a letter. A must a try phone!

customer_reviews.title: good product....
customer_reviews.text: it scared me when i first received it since it wouldn't charge. but i realized it was a problem regarding the charger. Its a used unlocked verizon phone in very good condition. no scratch at all. i now have to cut my sim so it can fit. I bought from ANARCHY MOBILE.

STL100-4 is what I was sold and its strictly a Verizon phone with the capability of holding a sim if unlocked on ATT etc..Doesnt mean I want to use a highpowered phone for 2G edge speed! Stop hiding the info from potential customers and be truthful and upfront.

Durable exterior, gorgeous OS and productive interaction and speed. I removed 1 star only because the battery lasts about a day with moderate use. However, it is minor for me. Great phone BlackBerry!

customer_reviews.title: She is happy so
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She is happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, arrived in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, arrived in good condition, meets all requirements widely recommended. thanks for everything.
customer_reviews.author: el jecker

customer_reviews.title: great OS, intuitive user interface
customer_reviews.text: PRO: great OS, intuitive user interface. cons: as usual as everybody mentioned apps but i'm fine with the apps it comes with and few that i douwnloaded. Other thing i thought was the battery life was ok.. Charged every 2 day (used bluetooh and Wifi every day. on most of the time which is was consumed most of the battery.) The Phone and BB10 OS is great. I'm happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavesh P.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected..
customer_reviews.text: I expected a clean white blackberry Z10 without the verizon brand on my 2nd purchase and I still returned it...The first seller was all the same but was much worse when they just packed everything in a plastic mold that was not even for blackberry and threw in a car charger as a consolation...my advice to all...e-mail the seller first to make sure that they get everything delivered right... Joseph C.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a gsm unlocked phone and I have att and it does not allow data unless on wifi fix this or refund and the phone says Verizon on the outside which is cdma
customer_reviews.author: chris zeman

customer_reviews.title: smooth Z10
customer_reviews.text: so... what i can say? love the OS, great, smooth, also with nice design and back plastic so soft and sleek with great feeling.
customer_reviews.author: ezzo

customer_reviews.title: The condition of the phone where mint so everyone was happy!
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, the operating sistem leaves a lot to want for. The condition of the phone where mint so everyone was happy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gavilanez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very good, it is very easy to use. the only detail is that I had to cut my sim card to place it in the slot but as soon as I put work wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Ismaira Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Z10
customer_reviews.text: hi I bought A Z10 from you and I cant use it with my carrier ..there telling me that I need a Stl100-1 or a Stl100-3 an the one I bought is a Stl100-2... can you tell me how I can get the to work so I can be happy with it...it same like the APN needs to change..my carrier is Digicel ... thank you
customer_reviews.author: Shadeed K Green

customer_reviews.title: Application download
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my new Blackberry Z10 smartphone about a couple of days ago so I am still learning from it. However, it seems it will work well here in US. One issue i have faced with my phone is that as I tried to download Viber from the App store, I was told that the item is not available for your selected advice, i.e. blackberry Z10. So does it mean viber does not work with type of phone?
customer_reviews.author: Gosbert S.

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited about this phone and am so disappointed it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive a media card or manual with this phone. It took forever to boot up and hung at 99%. The on/off button does work, I have to remove the battery from the phone to shut it off. I was so excited about this phone and am so disappointed it didn't work. Am curious as to whether these phones are tested before shipping. How can anyone not check? Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the camera this phone has. The screen resolution is awesome.This phone is much cheaper than the other phones with similar specs.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Blackberry
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and is now working successfully. Only had to go to AT&T store for a smaller SIM card, as the one from my old phone was too large.They downloaded the information to the smaller SIM card and I was in business. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Blackberry Lover

customer_reviews.title: 2014 and was very happy. But last week my blackberry stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It's the most disapponting purchase. I bought it on June 7, 2014 and was very happy. But last week my blackberry stopped working. Cell phone service cannnot fix it, because the nand memory was broken. So i used my blackberry only 4 month and now I have to buy new one. I cannot return it because I live in Russia. Is there any chance to receive compensation payment?
customer_reviews.author: Elena P.

customer_reviews.title: blackberry fan
customer_reviews.text: its very nice to this one use in few.. charging in not long time
customer_reviews.author: soundararajan raman

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this phone...!! Will write a full review later.... It's just smooth, fast, responsive and the keyboard is the best thing ever....
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Willliams

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: The device works wonders and I just can't get enough of Blackberry, I have had all sort of blackberry device in the last 7 years and they are yet to come short of my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Khamba

customer_reviews.title: Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Good, it is a recommended supplier since I realize the sending in time and is a good product of excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Salas

customer_reviews.title: This phone is really great. I have no problems with it
customer_reviews.text: This phone is really great. I have no problems with it. It does however require a smaller SIM card, so I had to go to my carriers store and get a new one and that took about 15 minutes. The camera isn't as great as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: buy another blackberry. or other phone.
customer_reviews.text: phone doesn't ring at all. never know when i get my notifications. everyone says put the volume up on the phone. no s*** buddy, like i didnt do that. still wont ring when i put the ringer on loud.
customer_reviews.author: Trevell jones

customer_reviews.title: It's a STEAL!
customer_reviews.text: No matter which sub-model you purchase. A $750 phone for around $200 how can anybody pass this up. Also it can run Android apps. What more do you want? More speed? Spend more money, because you're not going to find it in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte m. martin

customer_reviews.title: This phone is Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone, it is fast have good processor and 2GB ram, but Blackberry does not have too many application as Android and Apple have, most of games which are free on Android we have to pay in Blackberry, Phone looks good it is very fast
customer_reviews.author: ZEE

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete accessories,
customer_reviews.text: It shown on amazon website or advertisement that bbz10 comes with all the accessories, when i received my package was on the generic box, no headset, usually blackberry cellpohones comes with the pouch, none of that. It was advertise as new items. I am very disappointed next time i will order on ebay.
customer_reviews.author: ronald

product_meta.title: BlackBerry Z10 STL100-1 16GB GSM Phone - White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Z10 is sporting modern specs, like a 4.2 LCD with 1280 x 768 pixels, a 1.5 GHz dual-core processor and 2 GB of RAM, & 16GB internal memory.
feature_bullets: BlackBerry 10 (upgradable); Internal Memory: 16GB storage, 2GB RAM, microSD Slot Expandable up to 64GB
8 Megapixel Camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus & LED Flash + Front-Facing 2 Megapixel Camera
Dual-Core 1.5 GHz Krait Processor, Chipset: Qualcomm MSM896 Snapdragon, Adreno 225 Graphics
Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, dual-band, DLNA, Wi-Fi hotspot, Bluetooth: v4.0 with A2DP, LE, USB: microUSB v2.0, GPS: with A-GPS support
